claims.claim: Moloco's platform delivers 400% return on ad spend (ROAS)
claims.quote: Enter retail media networks (RMNs)—uniquely positioned to sell not just ad space, but outcomes like a 400% return on ad spend (ROAS) or even a cost-per-order (CPO). At Moloco, our machine learning platform has powered advertisers to hit these targets with precision

claims.claim: Moloco's predictive engine delivers 3x higher ROAS vs. legacy RMNs
claims.quote: Moloco's predictive engine adjusts campaigns on the fly—boosting bids for high-intent users, dialing back on tire-kickers—delivering 3x higher ROAS vs. legacy RMNs with static ad models

claims.claim: A $10,000 sponsored product campaign can drive $40,000 in sales with 5:1 ROAS
claims.quote: A TV spot may drive reach, but a $10,000 sponsored product campaign on an RMN can drive $40,000 in sales—and prove it with closed-loop attribution... An RMN can serve a Samsung ad, track the $800 sale, and show a 5:1 ROAS

claims.claim: Return on Ad Spend improved by up to 214% for advertisers who diversified beyond Google and Meta
claims.quote: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) improved by as much as 214% (Day 30) for consumer mobile app marketers who diversified their media mix to include channels outside Google and Meta

claims.claim: Turo saw increased platform bookings validated through incrementality modeling
claims.quote: Since expanding our channels beyond social partners, we've seen an increase in platform bookings that we have been able to validate through incrementality modeling
Most of the strong results come from in-stream video ads within AVOD, FAST, and live TV content. These formats are non-skippable, with completion rates as high as 93–96%

claims.quote: For instance, Krafton leveraged Moloco CTV to support the launch of 'Cookie Run India' in the Indian market. They used CTV for upper- and mid-funnel reach, while mobile DSPs captured lower-funnel conversions, driving significant growth

claims.quote: A leading sports betting app achieved strong results with geo-targeted campaigns and CTV's clean ad environment. During a major sports season, they achieved strong conversion efficiency, demonstrating how scalable and performance-driven CTV has become
